title: Mysterium pietatis or The mysterie of godlinesse wherein the mysteries contained in the incarnation circumcision wise-men passion resurrection ascension. Of the Son of God, and comeing of the Holy-Ghost, are unfolded and applied. At Edinburgh. By Will. Annand, M.A. one of the ministers of that city, late of University Coll. Oxon.
author: Annand, William, 1633-1689.
publisher: printed for Robert Boulter, at the Turks-head, in Corn-hill near to the Royall Exchange,
notes: The words "incarnation .. wise-men" and "passion .. ascension." are bracketed together on the title page.
Each section has separate caption title.
Final leaf bears vertical title: Mr. VVill. Annand his Mysterium pietatis.
Copy tightly bound; cropped at head.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
